Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • laba1.task2.Shape
      • laba1.task2.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends Shape
    Implementation of the Shape class which allows to create triangles.
    Author:
    Vasiliy

    • Constructor Detail

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(double... coordinates)
        Constructor with varargs to simplify the creation of an instance. Constructs the triangle with specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - the coordinates of the points of the quadrangle in the following order: Ax, Ay, Bx, By, Cx, Cy.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are less or more than six doubles.

      • Triangle

        public Triangle()

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(double ax,
                double ay,
                double bx,
                double by,
                double cx,
                double cy)
        Constructs the triangle with specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        ax - the X-Asis coordinate of the A point of the triangle
        ay - the Y-Asis coordinate of the A point of the triangle
        bx - the X-Asis coordinate of the B point of the triangle
        by - the Y-Asis coordinate of the B point of the triangle
        cx - the X-Asis coordinate of the C point of the triangle
        cy - the Y-Asis coordinate of the C point of the triangle
